ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Course I m a Wizard...just made level 14 today I hope I keep it for awhile.... I haven t really been saving money. I got all my cloth armor off of Orcs so
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 12 May 1999 19:49:19 -0700, Joe Wallace wrote:

> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> 70pp?!?!? How long have you been saving money? And you are a wizard?


Course I'm a Wizard...just made level 14 today I hope I keep it for
awhile.... I haven't really been saving money. I got all my cloth armor off
of Orcs so I didn't have to spend any there. I helped outfit a Druid friend
3 weeks ago(patch and some snakeskin) And just today I bought some Netted
and Woven(cost me 6pp total) and I have just over 80pp as of today. My
suggestions: loot everything up to about level 8. Then know what crits carry
what... In a period of an hour I got 5 greater lightstones from wisps. I
know to look for them at night and you can tell which ones they have...this
is important since at levels 9 and 10 you will be almost dead and OOM pretty
much when you kill a wisp. So you have to make every potential kill worth
your downtime. I also suggest that you do not stay in one place...Camping
does not make cash for anyone except in dungeons and I rarely go into the
dungeons yet.....All the Crits that move around are good to hunt. Wisps have
up to 4 gold..Evil Eyes have up to 4pp. With a party taking turns on looting
Evil Eyes each person should get about 3 loots an hour, that's a huge
profit. Explore...I've been almost everywhere and I don't get to play all
that much... It's out there....


Cinius Shade(Mith Mar)
